availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph F. Brodrick (Mason County, Kentucky, insurance agent, druggist, and councilman)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, insurance agent, druggist, and councilman. Kentucky native. Married to Frances Cox Brodrick in Mason County, Kentucky, on October 6, 1841. Father of Phoebe Brodrick, Foreman Brodrick, and Mary Brodrick. Insurance agent in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Druggist in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the Maysville Board of Council in Mason County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 54B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 356.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 1, p.397A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281843.
KYR-0001-004-0468.
